performance-move-constructor-init.description:
Description

“cert-oop11-cpp” redirects here as an alias for this check.

The check flags user-defined move constructors that have a ctor-initializer
initializing a member or base class through a copy constructor instead of a
move constructor.
performance-move-constructor-init.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
